abstract: BNP Paribas, France’s biggest listed bank, suggested Wednesday that it was interested in acquiring the French bank branches of a British rival, HSBC.
lead_paragraph: BNP Paribas, France’s biggest listed bank, suggested Wednesday that it was interested in acquiring the French bank branches of a British rival, HSBC.

headline.main: BNP Paribas Interested in HSBC Branches, Mum on SocGen
